programme.title: 4 Tahun Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat.(n)

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit S1
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mariam berjumpa Tok Moh yang mengatakan dia telah diganggu penjelmaan seorang wanita dan tidak lagi mahu berterusan dengan tugasan memisahkan Rafiq dan Sarakit. Mengimbas balik, Mariam enggan memberikan kebenaran untuk Rafiq berkahwin dengan Sarakit. Mariam telah berjumpa Tok Moh untuk memisahkan Rafiq dari Sarakit yang menyebabkan Sarakit diganggu mimpi ngeri. Kini, Mariam pula diganggu penjelmaan Sarakit dan perkara ini diceritakan kepada Rafiq. Rafiq mengambil keputusan untuk pulang kerana memikirkan Sarakit yang masih belum dapat dihubungi. Ramdi pula diganggu hantu tenggek yang dibawa merayau-rayau setiap malam. Pada satu malam, Pak Bado pula mendengar suara bayi menangis dan mendapati bungkusan mengandungi janin di hadapan rumahnya yang diletak oleh lembaga putih berambut panjang.(n)

programme.title: Azam
programme.desc: Azam seorang pemuda yang perlu menghadapi masyarakat selepas 17 tahun menjalani hukuman akibat melakukan rompakan di sebuah bank. Tetapi masyarakat kampung nyata tidak mudah menerima seorang bekas banduan. Bukan itu sahaja, bekas isterinya Tipah yang kini telah berkahwin dengan Musa seorang guru silat tidak dapat menerimanya. Kecuali Pak Itam dan isterinya sahaja yang bersimpati, Azam harus menghadapi pelbagai tohmahan dan penghinaan daripada orang kampung.(n)

programme.title: Budak Magik
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah bagaimana Imran berjaya membuktikan kebolehan magiknya kepada Maira iaitu seorang remaja perempuan yang terlebih dahulu dibawah jagaan nenek Imran kerana ibunya bekerja di Kuala Lumpur. Maira menceritakan kebolehan Imran kepada rakan-rakannya Haikal dan Zara yang tidak sangka kebolehan Imran itu kemudiannya mendapat tarikan khalayak kampung yang sanggup membayar untuk menyaksi pertunjukannya ketika dia berada di kedai Pak Salim. Dalam perjalanan pulang mereka berempat telah melihat lintasan cahaya diruang angkasa yang kemudiannya menyebabkan mereka demam.(n)

programme.title: Seekers Underground
programme.desc: Ep.03&4 - Seekers kembali dengan nama baru Seekers Underground. Dengan teknologi baru serta tinjaun ke lokasi yang belum pernah diterokai.(n)

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong
programme.desc: Tom yum goong (2005) ialah filem Thai,Inggeris,Mandarin,Vietnam. Prachya Pinkaew telah mengarahkan filem ini. Tony Jaa,Nathan Jones,Xing Jin,Petchtai Wongkamlao adalah pelakon filem ini. Ia telah dikeluarkan pada tahun 2005. Tom yum goong (2005) dianggap sebagai salah satu filem Aksi, Jenayah, Drama, Thriller terbaik di India dan di seluruh dunia.(n)

programme.title: Bodyguard
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Rashid difitnah oleh Amran, dia dikatakan mempunyai hubungan cinta dengan Rohani. Ini menimbulkan kemarahan Eliza kepada Rashid. Danial sebagi bodyguard terus menjaga keselamatan Eliza khususnya dari dicederakan oleh Amran. Eliza meminta Danial menyiasat aktiviti Amran dan memaklumkan kepadanya. Mikhail mula berbaik-baik dengan anaknya Aiman, dia juga selalu membelikan mainan kepada Aiman. Pada suatu hari, Aiman telah hilang, akhirnya Rahul dan Maya menjumpai Aiman di rumah rakannya. Aiman memberitahu dia telah berjumpa dengan Mikhail bapa kandungnya yang masih hidup. Farish yang ditugaskan boduguard Adam telah balik ke kampung bersama Adam dengan menaiki motorsikal. Mereka terus diekori Kumpulan Kobra untuk membunuhnya. Ryan pula diminta menghalau Datin Maziah dari rumah Dato’ Zailani. Ryan juga diminta mencari semula bekas isteri Dato’ Zailani. Ryan mulai syak Mak Jah adalah bekas isteri Dato majikannya. Nasha berterusan menerima bunga dari orang yang tidak dikenali.(n)

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong
programme.desc: Tom yum goong (2005) ialah filem Thai,Inggeris,Mandarin,Vietnam. Prachya Pinkaew telah mengarahkan filem ini. Tony Jaa,Nathan Jones,Xing Jin,Petchtai Wongkamlao adalah pelakon filem ini. Ia telah dikeluarkan pada tahun 2005. Tom yum goong (2005) dianggap sebagai salah satu filem Aksi, Jenayah, Drama, Thriller terbaik di India dan di seluruh dunia.(n)

programme.title: Bodyguard S1
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Farish, Ryan dan Bakri masuk ke lokasi pemprosesan dadah kumpulan Samad. Mereka berjaya menumpaskan kumpulan tersebut. Tahir, selepas mendengar kesalahan yang dilakukan oleh adiknya Samad terpkasa melepaskan Haris dan Anuar dari kawalannya. Farish pula cuba menyelamatkan Kasandra dari tawanan Mazlan, dia berjaya membawa Kasandra keluar setelah helahnya menyamar sebagai peminat Kasandra telah membuat Mazlan tertipu. Dalam kes berasingan, Bakri sebagai bodyguard kepada Eira diminta berpura-pura menjadi teman lelaki Eira semasa mereka balik di kampung untuk berjumpa ibunya. Hakim pula telah menawan Yasmin dan pengurus pusat peranginan, Danial cuba mengesan kedudukan Yasmin dan Hakim.(n)

programme.title: Cicakman 2
programme.desc: Profesor Klon yang jahat kembali, bukan sahaja untuk menggulingkan Kerajaan tetapi juga untuk mengawal bekalan air tawar dunia melalui rancangannya yang bijak, "Air Hitam". Apabila planet biru kita hanya mempunyai 72 jam sebelum menjadi hitam, Cicakman datang untuk menyelamatkan. Tetapi dia bukan sahaja berhadapan dengan pembunuh upahan artistik Profesor Klon "Rrama\.(n)

programme.title: Budak Magik
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah bagaimana Imran berjaya membuktikan kebolehan magiknya kepada Maira iaitu seorang remaja perempuan yang terlebih dahulu dibawah jagaan nenek Imran kerana ibunya bekerja di Kuala Lumpur. Maira menceritakan kebolehan Imran kepada rakan-rakannya Haikal dan Zara yang tidak sangka kebolehan Imran itu kemudiannya mendapat tarikan khalayak kampung yang sanggup membayar untuk menyaksi pertunjukannya ketika dia berada di kedai Pak Salim. Dalam perjalanan pulang mereka berempat telah melihat lintasan cahaya diruang angkasa yang kemudiannya menyebabkan mereka demam.(n)

programme.title: Hantu Wangan
programme.desc: Kintang Kintung mengalami gangguan paranormal selepas tidak sengaja melanggar sorang gadis , menyebabkan kematian gadis itu.(n)

programme.title: Bodyguard
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Danial terpaksa menyelamatkan Yasmin dari tawanan Hakim. Hakim mengalami halunisasi akibat telah lama tidak mengambil ubat psikiatrik. Dato’ Bakri bapa kepada Yasmin dan Datin Rosnah ibu kepada Hakim akan berkahwin. Dalam kes berasingan, Mazlan telah ditangkap oleh orang-orang bodyguard Farish. Dia diberi amaran supaya tidak memaparkan gambar bogel Kasandra. Mazlan diberhentikan kerja sebagai Pengurus Kasandra. Eisha sepupu kepada Farish, meminta pertolongan ibu Farish memujuk supaya Farish bersetuju berkahwin dengannya. Akibatnya perhubungan Farish dengan Nasha menghadapi masalah. Bakri bodyguard Eira pulang ke kampung. Eira terpikat dengan Azlan, Sebaliknya Mak Mah terpikat dengan Bakri untuk dijodohkan dengan Eira. Dalam kes baru, Ryan bodyguard kepada seorang Dato’ menghadapi masalah dengan seorang perempuan simpanan.(n)

programme.title: Azem 3
programme.desc: Seorang isteri cemburu "zehra" meragui suaminya mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan rakannya, dia merancang untuk melaksanakan sihir hitam oleh beberapa syeikh yang jahat untuk mendapatkan suaminya kembali daripada pesaingnya. Beberapa siri peristiwa hebat mula berlaku kepada rakannya berakhir dengan pembunuhan "zehra" y suaminya untuk mengelakkan skandal curang.(n)

programme.title: Budak Magik
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah bagaimana Imran berjaya membuktikan kebolehan magiknya kepada Maira iaitu seorang remaja perempuan yang terlebih dahulu dibawah jagaan nenek Imran kerana ibunya bekerja di Kuala Lumpur. programme.title: Azam
programme.desc: Azam seorang pemuda yang perlu menghadapi masyarakat selepas 17 tahun menjalani hukuman akibat melakukan rompakan di sebuah bank. Tetapi masyarakat kampung nyata tidak mudah menerima seorang bekas banduan. Bukan itu sahaja, bekas isterinya Tipah yang kini telah berkahwin dengan Musa seorang guru silat tidak dapat menerimanya. Kecuali Pak Itam dan isterinya sahaja yang bersimpati, Azam harus menghadapi pelbagai tohmahan dan penghinaan daripada orang kampung.(n)

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit S1
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Dina diminta Mariam untuk menggoda Rafiq dan berkahwin dengannya. Semasa keluar makan malam dengan Dina, Rafiq ternampak bayang Sarakit dalam kereta. Pada malam yang sama, Mariam sekali lagi diganggu penjelmaan Sarakit dan Mariam berada dalam ketakutan. Mariam mendesak Rafiq meninggalkan Sarakit yang dikatakan mengamalkan ilmu sihir. Rafiq enggan mempercayai kata-kata ibunya dan pulang ke Sarakit. Di rumah, Sarakit tidak kelihatan dan Rafiq berihat di sofa setelah membeli bahanbahan makanan. Sarakit telah memasak untuk Rafiq dan mengingatkan Rafiq janjinya iaitu tidak akan meninggalkan Sarakit. Sarakit kemudiannya menuduh Rafiq berlaku curang dan Rafiq menafikannya. Rafiq menyakinkan Sarakit bahawa dia hanya mencintai Sarakit seorang sahaja. Rafiq terjaga dan mendapati apa yang berlaku antaranya dan Sarakit hanyalah mimpi.(n)

programme.title: 4 Tahun Di Rumah Hantu
programme.desc: 4 Tahun Tinggal di Rumah Hantu adalah film horor Indonesia yang dirilis pada tahun 2014. Film ini merupakan adaptasi sebuah novel berdasarkan kisah nyata yang menceritakan rumah hantu di Kota Depok, Jawa Barat.(n)

programme.title: Amukan Pocong S1
programme.desc: Episod mengisahkan Tok Sayut, Sulaiman dan penghulu bermesyuarat untuk menyelesaikan masalah pocong ini. Tepat tengah malam, ketika pocong sedang hendak mendapatkan mangsa ke 13nya, Long Husin bagaikan terpanggil untuk pergi ke paya tersebut. Awang juga tidak dapat berbuat apa-apa, kerana apa juga kuasa yang ada padanya, dapat ditewaskan Tok Sayut. Jasad Long Husin yang ditakluki Awang turut tewas.(n)

programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting… takut ke tak?(n)

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: Seorang gadis sekolah menyertai dua pencipta kandungan internet dalam projek video seram yang dirakamkan di bangunan lama di belakang sekolah mereka. Ketiga-tiga mereka bertemu dengan kumpulan pembuli dan apabila peristiwa berlaku, menjadi jelas bahawa gadis itu menyimpan dendam peribadi terhadap kumpulan itu dan dibutakan oleh kebencian untuk melaksanakan keadilan, walaupun ia bermakna mengorbankan orang yang tidak bersalah….(n)

programme.title: Best Of Animax
programme.desc: Best Of Animax - Enjoy a variety of curated content specially from Animax.(n)

programme.title: A Destructive God Sits Next To Me
programme.desc: So Merry Christmas - Seri faces challenges while trying to give Kotoko a Christmas present, but Kabuto swoops in to save his plans.(n)

programme.title: A Destructive God Sits Next To Me
programme.desc: Happy Happy Greeting - Seri worries about his ability to progress to Year 3 in school and tries to get to the bottom of Kabuto’s strange behaviour.(n)

programme.title: A Destructive God Sits Next To Me
programme.desc: In The Future - Seri faces a new love rival, and his concerns about not being able to enter university reaches its peak.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 436 - Adrian and Diane serve as outside counsel for a broadcast network planning to air a controversial segment that would derail the career of a beloved male movie star. Maia and Lucca have vastly different experiences while on separate ride-alongs with the Chicago Police Department.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 443 - Adrian becomes an overnight celebrity after his candid appearance on a cable news show goes viral. Lucca, who has yet to formally announce her pregnancy, worries about her future at the firm. Meanwhile, Adrian’s newfound cable news fame grabs the attention of Chicago’s top law firm and the jury of his latest case.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 450 - A Democratic National Committee consultant, Ruth Eastman, approaches Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart to develop a confidential impeachment strategy for the DNC against President Trump, leaving the firm's partners at odds. After an impromptu visit from Colin’s mom, Lucca is left feeling suspicious of her motives. Maia is intrigued by Ruth’s assistant, Carine.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 457 - Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart represent an African-American undercover cop, Rashid Clarkson, who was left crippled after being shot by another Chicago police officer in the line of duty. The case’s opposing counsel is legend Solomon Waltzer, whose tactics have the firm questioning the legitimacy of his evidence. Diane finds herself at a crossroads with both Kurt and Tully.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 464 - A Russian student asks Diane to protect her from deportation, claiming she was one of the women filmed with President Trump in the alleged “Golden Shower” tape. Meanwhile, Maia and Lucca suggest an unconventional lawyer to represent Jay’s friend Craig Savador at his upcoming appeal and Colin meets with the Cook County Democratic Committee.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 471 - Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart is left in disarray after a partner at the firm becomes the latest “Kill All Lawyers” victim by an unknown assailant. The Chicago police chief causes a stir when he goes after the firm’s high profile clients Lemond Bishop and Colin Sweeney as potential suspects. Amidst the chaos, Colin is reminded of his true feelings for Lucca.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 478 - Heated debates occur at the firm when Liz and Maia represent a well-known photographer, Ron Williams, suing a woman who provided an account of their relationship to a website. Jay continues to investigate possible suspects in Adrian’s shooting.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 485 - Jay is arrested on a fraudulent charge while driving Maia and a witness in a case involving Colin Sweeney’s fiancée, Naftali Amado, to court. The firm rallies to help Jay when they realize U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement is involved.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 492 - Season two finale. The FBI question Diane as part of a job background check on Kurt, leading to unexpected and serious consequences. The mayor of Chicago invites Adrian and Julius to join a 'think tank' tasked with figuring out how to spend funds.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 408 - An unfortunate event brings the firm together, along with the prospect of a new name partner, Liz Reddick-Lawrence. Meanwhile, Diane struggles to grapple with the insanity of the world and Maia is confronted with another hurdle in her parents’ scandal.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 415 - Tensions remain high when the firm learns another Chicago lawyer has been murdered by a client. Liz has her first day at Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart and positions herself as a potential ally for Diane. Maia’s trial takes an unwelcome turn when a surprise witness is called to testify against her. Lucca and Colin go head-to-head in court.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 422 - Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart represent a young woman who was assaulted while a contestant on the reality dating show “Chicago Penthouse.” Diane fears she might be the next “Kill All Lawyers” target.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 429 - Liz decides to represent her son’s favorite teacher after she senses the school fired him for illegitimate reasons. Lucca enlists the help of Elsbeth Tascioni when an unanticipated lawsuit hits close to home. Despite the recent chemical scare, the firm throws a party to celebrate their new offices.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 436 - Adrian and Diane serve as outside counsel for a broadcast network planning to air a controversial segment that would derail the career of a beloved male movie star. Maia and Lucca have vastly different experiences while on separate ride-alongs with the Chicago Police Department.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 443 - Adrian becomes an overnight celebrity after his candid appearance on a cable news show goes viral. Lucca, who has yet to formally announce her pregnancy, worries about her future at the firm. Meanwhile, Adrian’s newfound cable news fame grabs the attention of Chicago’s top law firm and the jury of his latest case.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 450 - A Democratic National Committee consultant, Ruth Eastman, approaches Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart to develop a confidential impeachment strategy for the DNC against President Trump, leaving the firm's partners at odds. After an impromptu visit from Colin’s mom, Lucca is left feeling suspicious of her motives. Maia is intrigued by Ruth’s assistant, Carine.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 457 - Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart represent an African-American undercover cop, Rashid Clarkson, who was left crippled after being shot by another Chicago police officer in the line of duty. The case’s opposing counsel is legend Solomon Waltzer, whose tactics have the firm questioning the legitimacy of his evidence. Diane finds herself at a crossroads with both Kurt and Tully.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 464 - A Russian student asks Diane to protect her from deportation, claiming she was one of the women filmed with President Trump in the alleged “Golden Shower” tape. Meanwhile, Maia and Lucca suggest an unconventional lawyer to represent Jay’s friend Craig Savador at his upcoming appeal and Colin meets with the Cook County Democratic Committee.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 471 - Reddick, Boseman and Lockhart is left in disarray after a partner at the firm becomes the latest “Kill All Lawyers” victim by an unknown assailant. The Chicago police chief causes a stir when he goes after the firm’s high profile clients Lemond Bishop and Colin Sweeney as potential suspects. Amidst the chaos, Colin is reminded of his true feelings for Lucca.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 478 - Heated debates occur at the firm when Liz and Maia represent a well-known photographer, Ron Williams, suing a woman who provided an account of their relationship to a website. Jay continues to investigate possible suspects in Adrian’s shooting.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 485 - Jay is arrested on a fraudulent charge while driving Maia and a witness in a case involving Colin Sweeney’s fiancée, Naftali Amado, to court. The firm rallies to help Jay when they realize U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement is involved.(n)

programme.title: The Good Fight S2
programme.desc: Day 492 - Season two finale. The FBI question Diane as part of a job background check on Kurt, leading to unexpected and serious consequences. The mayor of Chicago invites Adrian and Julius to join a 'think tank' tasked with figuring out how to spend funds.(n)

programme.desc: When a University student refuses to sleep with her professor in exchange for good grades, she’s in danger of being killed to keep her quiet, and her mother must drop everything to save her.(n)

programme.title: In The Line Of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent seeks to redeem himself by saving the life of his country's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing his own.(n)

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.(n)

programme.title: Category 5
programme.desc: A series of disastrous geological coincidences occur creating a perfect storm scenario and forming the largest hurricane in human history.(n)

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A primatologist wants to return a gorilla to the wild, and a geologist wants to find diamonds. Their mutual expedition to the Congo uncovers the lost city of Zinj - and its deadly secret.(n)

programme.title: Sensasi Bola
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.(n)

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback
programme.desc: Ep.UFC Fight Flashback 1004: Teixeira vs. Prochazka - UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: Liqui Moly Motorrad Grand Prix Deutschland Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Car and bike races have been held on closed public roads in the area around the town of Chemnitz, Germany since the 1920s and were still taking place until as recently as 1990. It was decided, however, that the five mile course through such a densely populated area was no longer suitable and a new circuit was built five miles west of Chemnitz in 1996. Although mainly used as a driver training centre and road transport safety station, Sachsenring first hosted MotoGP in 1998 and many improvements have taken place since then, including a drastic layout enhancement in 2001. Numerous tight corners make it one of the slower tracks on the calendar but there is never any shortage of close racing action.(n)

programme.title: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Prelims - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.(n)

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time makes his return to the Octagon on April 15 when Max “Blessed” Holloway faces off with British sensation Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at T-Mobile Center in Kansas City, Missouri. Eager to get back in the race to regain his title, Hawaii’s Holloway has won two of his last three, defeating Calvin Kattar and Yair Rodriguez, and he is ready to pull out all the stops against Allen, who’s 12-fight winning streak includes victories over Kattar, Dan Hooker and Sodiq Yusuff.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time makes his return to the Octagon on April 15 when Max “Blessed” Holloway faces off with British sensation Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at T-Mobile Center in Kansas City, Missouri. Eager to get back in the race to regain his title, Hawaii’s Holloway has won two of his last three, defeating Calvin Kattar and Yair Rodriguez, and he is ready to pull out all the stops against Allen, who’s 12-fight winning streak includes victories over Kattar, Dan Hooker and Sodiq Yusuff.(n)

programme.desc: Somali pirates attack the Maersk Alabama, a container ship, while it is on its course to Kenya. Richard Phillips, the captain of the ship, uses his wits to negotiate with them to save his crew.(n)

programme.title: Searching
programme.desc: David Kim files a police complaint in order to find his missing daughter, Margot. However, a string of hidden truths unravels when he checks her laptop.(n)

programme.title: Pan's Labyrinth
programme.desc: Ofelia moves with her mother to her stepfather's house. At night, a fairy leads her to a faun who informs her that she is a princess and she needs to participate in three tasks to prove her royalty.(n)

programme.desc: Paprika, a therapist, must save the day when a machine that allows therapists to enter the dreams of their patients is stolen.(n)

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Adam, a monster created by Frankenstein, realises that his true calling is to save humanity after he finds himself in the middle of a war between the two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.(n)

programme.title: Wild Things: Diamonds In The Rough
programme.desc: Marie Clifton is supposed to inherit two diamonds from her stepfather Jay. But Elena Sandoval, who accuses Jay of raping her, tries to claim the same. Who will win this ugly game?(n)

programme.title: Fight To the Finish
programme.desc: Sean, an amateur fighter, interferes in the personal life of a hardened criminal. When the criminal threatens his life, Sean decides to settle the matter in a fighting tournament.(n)

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.(n)

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.(n)

programme.title: Umma
programme.desc: Amanda tries to move past her traumatic childhood and shifts to an American farm along with her daughter. But when she receives her mother's ashes, her past comes back to haunt her.(n)

programme.title: Hard Ball
programme.desc: Conor O'Neill strikes a bargain in order to get a loan to pay off his gambling debts. He must coach a Little League baseball team to keep his end of the bargain.(n)

programme.title: Studio 666
programme.desc: Foo Fighters, the legendary rock band, move into a mansion in Encino to complete their new album. But Dave Grohl becomes possessed by supernatural forces and becomes a threat to all others.(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Phil, a self-centred weatherman, goes to the town of Punxsutawney for an assignment. He is later shocked when he wakes up the next morning and realises that he is reliving the same day over and over.(n)

programme.title: Nine Days
programme.desc: Will interviews five souls for a period of nine days and decides whether they should be born into the world. But the process becomes difficult for him when his own past begins to catch up with him.(n)

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two disgraced cops, Terry and Allen, are assigned a task to investigate a case involving a shady capitalist. They must put aside their differences and turn into the officers they idolise.(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse
programme.desc: Angus, a lonely young boy, stumbles upon a large mysterious egg and decides to protect it. He soon realises that the mischievous hatchling inside the egg is a water horse, a fabled creature.(n)

programme.desc: Louis, an Interpol agent, and Eleanor, a district attorney, learn that their lives at risk after they team up to track the money that a bank is using to fund terrorism.(n)
